response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Given its immense value, it's worth noting that the product is also highly sought after by other potential buyers. Considering its worth and the demand, I propose to sell it to you for $18,000. This offer includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive training package and a year's worth of support to ensure seamless integration into your business processes. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and financial planning. Should you have any questions or require further details, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 18000}
